src:
El riesgo que debe tomar cada signo del zodiaco durante noviembre
Tu signo del zodiaco debe mantenerse firme este mes
06 Nov 2019, 18:11 by Karen Hernández
Aries
Deberías arriesgarte y finalmente decirle a esa persona cómo te sientes.
Tauro
Deberías arriesgarte y abandonar la situación tóxica en la que has estado.
Géminis
Deberías arriesgarte y contactar a esa persona con la que no has hablado en años.
Cáncer
Debes arriesgarte y confrontar a esa persona que te ha estado estresando.
Leo
Debes arriesgarte y disculparte con la persona que lastimas.
Virgo
Deberías arriesgarte y hacer un cambio importante en la forma en que has estado viviendo.
Libra
Deberías arriesgarte y compartir tu secreto con el mundo.
Escorpio
Debe arriesgarse y exponerse a su mayor temor.
Sagitario
Deberías arriesgarte y hacer un movimiento con esa persona que has estado observando.
Capricornio
Debe arriesgarse y solicitar la posición de sus sueños.
Acuario
Debe arriesgarse y abandonar su zona de confort el tiempo suficiente para lograr su próximo objetivo.
Piscis
Deberías arriesgarte y viajar a un lugar que nunca has visitado.
Te recomendamos en video
text:
The risk that every zodiac sign should take during November
Your zodiac sign must stand firm this month
06 Nov 2019, 18:11 by Karen Hernández
Aries
You should take a chance and finally tell that person how you feel.
Taurus
You should take a chance and leave the toxic situation you've been in.
Gemini
You should take a chance and contact that person you haven't talked to in years.
Cancer
You must take risks and confront that person who has been stressing you.
Leo
You must take risks and apologize to the person you hurt.
Virgo
You should take a risk and make a major change in the way you have been living.
Pound
You should take a chance and share your secret with the world.
Scorpio
You must take risks and expose yourself to your greatest fear.
Sagittarius
You should take a risk and make a move with that person you've been watching.
Capricorn
You must take risks and request the position of your dreams.
Aquarium
You must take risks and leave your comfort zone long enough to achieve your next goal.
Pisces
You should take a risk and travel to a place you've never visited.
We recommend you on video
